name: Mrs. Applebee's garden
description:
This is a short interactive story about an old lady, a duck and the challenges they face every day. Be a part of this story and dive into a detailled 3D world, full with music and sound effects!

My wife dared me to create a 3D game without violence for once. Well, there you go!

Use WSAD or arrow keys to move around. Click to interact.

The game was made for Ludum Dare 50 in 48 hours.
